snippet.title: Avowed Game Overview | Xbox Direct 2024
snippet.description:
During Xbox's January 2024 Developer Direct, Outer Worlds and Fallout: New Vegas developer Obsidian Entertainment gave an in-depth look into its newest RPG Avowed. We got a glimpse of its combat, ranging from melee, magic, and even firearms, and how players can swap between loadouts on the fly. Avowed is expected to release fall 2024.

#avowed #obsidiangames #xbox 
Intro - 0:00
Combat - 1:05
Quests and Side Quests - 3:20
Visual Style - 5:37
